title: 2 Quick Ways to Watch YouTube Videos Frame By Frame

steps.title: Navigate to a YouTube video.
steps.content: Navigate to a YouTube video. You can search for channels , browse playlists and your recommendations , or use the search bar to find a specific video. [1] X Research source This method will only work with the desktop version of YouTube and a physical keyboard.

steps.title: Pause the video.
steps.content: Pause the video. You can press Spacebar on your keyboard or click the video to pause it. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Use , or ..
steps.content: Use , or . . These characters can be found between the M and ? key on your keyboard. When you press these keys, the video can go frame-by-frame backwards or forwards. [3] X Research source Press the "," key to go backwards frame-by-frame. Press the "." key to go forwards frame-by-frame.

steps.title: Use the left and right arrow key (optional).
steps.content: Use the left and right arrow key (optional). This can be found on the right side of a full-sized keyboard. When you press these keys, the video can rewind or fast-forward by five seconds. [4] X Research source Press the left arrow key to rewind by five seconds. Press the right arrow key to fast-forward by five seconds.

steps.title: Navigate to a video.
steps.content: Navigate to a video. You can search for channels, browse playlists, or use the search bar to find a specific video. [5] X Research source Use this method if you're watching YouTube using the mobile app, a Smart TV , or elsewhere. Keep in mind you won't be able to view the video frame-by-frame, but you can watch it at 25% of its normal speed.

steps.title: Select the cog icon.
steps.content: Select the cog icon. The location will vary depending on your device, but it will most likely be at the top or bottom corner of the video. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Select Playback speed.
steps.content: Select Playback speed . This is next to the icon of half-dotted Play icon. By default, this should be set to Normal .

steps.title: Select 0.25x.
steps.content: Select 0.25x . This should be the very first option. You can also select 0.5x or 0.75x , but 0.25x is the slowest possible playback speed. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Play the video again.
steps.content: Play the video again. The video will begin playing at 0.25 speed.
